name: Football Life!
description:
Welcome to the life of a football player!

Become a pro athlete, get famous, meet celebrities and win the Super Bowl!

Are you ready to become the most known player of all time? Get ready for the games, win every match and choose your favorite team to play in.

Listen to the crowd cheering your name, your fans and cheerleaders are waiting for you here!


With tons of games and challenges to complete you will get addicted to this game!
publishers: RUBY OYUN VE YAZILIM DANISMANLIK SANAYI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
